content: As it might bitrot quickly, I would like to mention that in #3730 @Yaël Dillies would like to remove Cat suffix (which I had added during the port) in the names of the various categories of orders. (Although I am not convinced about doing the same for ModuleCat, etc, I have no objection for these, but I would let some other maintainer merge it.)
Let me mention that the sibling PR #3731 (for GroupCat -> Grp) is close to compiling again. Probably will be ready tomorrow.
On the opposite, I would have expected as a good practice that there is a uniform way to name the algebraic categories that embody the main algebraic types in mathlib.
My reasoning is lengthily explained in #mathlib4 (Naming convention ).
